version_description:
- Fixed: When user purchased the Remove Ads, clicking on the album will cause a crash.
- Fixed: Can't display the cancel button after searching on iPad
- Add series page rule
- Optimize Site Rule Editor
- More detail optimization
- Fixed: Can not redeem free sites when you have enough recommendations.

- Fixed an issue that could cause crashes when running on iOS 10.
- Fixed an issue that could cause crashes when browsing detail pages.
- Fixed an issue that could cause crashes when logging in to the site.
- Fixed an issue where browsing the Rea
- Fixed a few bugs, and improved overall performance.

- Fixed an issue where it was possible to get only the first image in a later reading.
- Fixed an issue where the search bar could not be displayed correctly on iOS 10.
- Fixed an issue that could cause a black screen to appear.
- Enhanced logic

- Fixed an issue where login information could not be saved normally after login;
- Fixed an issue where switching sites could cause the app to crash;
- Fixed an issue that could cause the app to crash when browsing images;
- Optimized image disp

- Enhanced login page: When the home page and the login page do not belong to the same Host, you can obtain the cookie of the specified page by specifying the URL.

If you think Yealico is very good, please recommend it to more friends. Thank you!

- Added continuous reading function for chapters.
Note: If the obtained chapters are sorted in reverse order, please specify the sorting method as DESC through the Site Order of SiteRule, otherwise the continuous reading is also reversed.

- Enhanced reading experience: support for horizontal screen, double-page one screen (iPad), click to turn pages and chapter sorting;
- Support GIF;
- Support for custom cookies;
- Fixed more discovered issues;

- サイトのリストページのUIインタフェースと操作を最適化します。
- 強化されたサイトルールロジック。特にビデオサイト向けに最適化されています。 詳細については、公式Webサイトを参照してください。
- ワンクリックで削除履歴（ブックマーク）を提供します。

Yealicoを愛しているなら、それを評価してより多くの友人に推薦してください。

使用中に問題が見つかった場合は、公式Webサイトまたはメールでフィードバックをお送りください。 問題のサイトルールを提供し、問題

- その他の詳細調整。

Yealicoを愛しているなら、それを評価してより多くの友人に推薦してください。

- 收藏夹可以进行分组啦！
- 修复了一些小问题；

如果您喜欢Yealico，请通过评价留言支持我们。

如果您在使用过程中发现更多问题，请通过官方网站或电子邮件将反馈发送给我们。最好能提供出现问题的站点规则，同时具体描述出现问题的操作过程。
谢谢！

网站：yealico.wordpress.com
邮箱：yealico.app@gmail.com
